text: The app works like a charm. However, there is an issue due to which I am rating it 3/5. In candle view of graph, it is not possible to click on every candle to check open, close, high, low and volume in android. When I click to one candle and slid my finger it often jumps 2 or 3 candles. But it is quite possible to navigate through each and every candle in iPhone. I hope it gets fixed soon. I will update my review after this bug is fixed in android.
